column5: Hi guys, heading to windsor for work, thought I would throw the musky rod in the car. Anyone got any spots? All I have been able to find online is belle river marina. Thanks
Windsor city ramp on riverside near mouth to St Clair.
Still good this time of the year ?
I wouldn't waste my time. Too early.

acsess is hard now. marinas are open no fishing. heres 1 spot that holds easy musky. riverside drive the foot of George ave. the east side cast from railing. theres always a few there. a dropoff/weedbed..the very east side of that waterfront park.
There that famous dock at the mouth of the Thames river on St clair. Don't know what it's called but you may be a bit early in the season...
